QUERY.TITLE: Rebuilding German Cities
QUERY.DESC: Find descriptions of the reconstruction of important and historic buildings in German towns or cities that were heavily damaged or destroyed by bombing during World_War_II .
QUERY.NARR: Relevant documents will describe the reconstruction of important and historic buildings in German towns that were heavily bombed during the Second_World_War . Any German city is of interest but it is expected that most documents will refer to Berlin , Dresden or Leipzig .
